title: Why Bard Sucks
body:
What is the true purpose of his ult,it's basically useless, only his q does damage.
What a lame support{{champion:432}}

replies.body: Bard can ult bot lane, give a tunnel for him and jungler... both literally chill and dance around the golden circle, then lee kicks jinx back to Riot headquarters. Bard is very situational.. Should really only be played by diamond+

team mate gonna die from death mark or ignite? ult him
see that jinx about to ult your unaware recalling adc? ult him
supports aren't always about damage
There is no "true purpose". His ult has many different uses.
